name: Reactor Run
description:
You play the role of Chonsie, a janitor at a nuclear reactor that has gone haywire. Use your platforming skills and anti-mutant spray to fight enemies across a few levels and clean up this mess!

This was another student project I led at Protege Game Studios, where I implemented the engine and some of the entity scripts, leaving the enemy, level and cutscene design/implementation to the students I worked with.

Controls:

  • Left/right = Move sideways
  • Up = Jump
  • Down = Crouch
  • Space = Spray bottle (once acquired, if ammo has recharged); skip cutscenes
  • (Cheat) Shift = Hold to fly while jumping
